title: Vampire Instinct
description: A brand-new Vampire Queen novel from the award-winning author who "never ceases to amaze." -Night Owl RomanceAs servant to vampire mistress Lady Daniela, Elisa is unwaveringly devoted-but she recoils at one shocking destroy the untamed, undead children entrusted to her care. There is one desperate Malachi, a Native American vampire who is a legend for his work with rehabilitating feline predators. And as Malachi struggles to control the young ones' impulses, he opens himself up to those of Elisa-and the passion they share for the night could seal their fates forever.
author: Joey W. Hill
